flawed_nl_solution:
Pedro has 100 squares - 60 squares = <<100-60=40>>40 more squares than Jesus.
Pedro has 100 squares - 75 squares = <<100-75=52>>52 more squares than Linden.
Combined Pedro has 40 squares + 52 squares = <<40+52=92>>92 squares more than both Jesus and Linden.
#### 92

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
